Concrete subclass of CoarsenTransactionFactory base class that allocates CoarsenCopyTransaction objects for a CoarsenSchedule object. More...

 Allocate a CoarsenCopyTransaction object.

Detailed Description

Concrete subclass of CoarsenTransactionFactory base class that allocates CoarsenCopyTransaction objects for a CoarsenSchedule object.

See also:
xfer::CoarsenCopyTransaction

const boost::shared_ptr< hier::PatchLevel > &  src_level,
const boost::shared_ptr< hier::BoxOverlap > &  overlap,
const hier::Box &  dst_box,

int  citem_id 
) const [virtual]

Allocate a CoarsenCopyTransaction object.

Parameters:
dst_level boost::shared_ptr to destination patch level.
src_level boost::shared_ptr to source patch level.
overlap boost::shared_ptr to overlap region between patches.
dst_box Destination Box in destination patch level.
src_box Source Box in source patch level.
citem_id Integer index of CoarsenClass::Data item associated with transaction.
Precondition:
(dst_level->getDim() == src_level->getDim()) && (dst_level->getDim() == dst_box.getDim()) && (dst_level->getDim() == src_box.getDim())

Implements SAMRAI::xfer::CoarsenTransactionFactory.
